    Intro to CMA

    a04-adherence.Rmd

    Adherence using CMA (continuous multiple-interval measures of medication availability/gaps)

    https://www.adherer.eu/adherence/

    library(AdherenceFromOMOP)

sample_data <- data.frame(
  person_id = c(1,1,1,1,1,2,2,2,3),
  drug_concept_id = c(1,1,1,1,1,1,1,1,1),
  drug_exposure_start_date = c(
    as.Date("2010-12-02"),
    as.Date("2011-05-31"),
    as.Date("2011-06-30"),
    as.Date("2011-12-27"),
    as.Date("2012-03-26"),
    as.Date("2011-05-31"),# // other patient
    as.Date("2011-06-30"), 
    as.Date("2011-12-27"), #
    as.Date("2011-06-30") # // last pt
    #as.Date("2011-12-27")
  ),
  days_supply = c(60,30,90,180,180,60,90,30, 90),
  cohort_start_date = rep(c(as.Date("2011-01-06")),times=9),
  cohort_end_date = rep(c(as.Date("2012-05-01")),times=9),
  observation_period_start_date = rep(c(as.Date("2009-11-07")),times=9),
  observation_period_end_date = rep(c(as.Date("2013-06-01")),times=9)
)
sample_data
    ##   person_id drug_concept_id drug_exposure_start_date days_supply
## 1         1               1               2010-12-02          60
## 2         1               1               2011-05-31          30
## 3         1               1               2011-06-30          90
## 4         1               1               2011-12-27         180
## 5         1               1               2012-03-26         180
## 6         2               1               2011-05-31          60
## 7         2               1               2011-06-30          90
## 8         2               1               2011-12-27          30
## 9         3               1               2011-06-30          90
##   cohort_start_date cohort_end_date observation_period_start_date
## 1        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 2        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 3        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 4        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 5        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 6        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 7        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 8        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
## 9        2011-01-06      2012-05-01                    2009-11-07
##   observation_period_end_date
## 1                  2013-06-01
## 2                  2013-06-01
## 3                  2013-06-01
## 4                  2013-06-01
## 5                  2013-06-01
## 6                  2013-06-01
## 7                  2013-06-01
## 8                  2013-06-01
## 9                  2013-06-01
    results <- AdherenceFromOMOP::adherenceCalculations(data = sample_data)

    CMA1 

    plot(results$CMA1, show.legend = TRUE, align.all.patients = FALSE, align.first.event.at.zero = TRUE, period.in.days = 60)

    # comments from code
# # For less than two events or when the first and the last events are on the same day, CMA1 does not make sense
# # Otherwise, the sum of durations of the events excluding the last divided by the number of days between the first and the last event
# ülemine:  (60+90) / 210
# all: (30+90+180) / 300

    CMA2

    # (numberof dayssupplyincludinglastevent)/(firsttolastevent) <- dokumentatsiooni kirjeldus 
# Comments from code: 
# For less than one event or when the first event is on the last day of the observation window, CMA2 does not make sense 
# Otherwise, the sum of durations of the events divided by the number of days between the first event and the end of the observation window <- imo dokumentatsioon on eksitav        
# 60 + 90 + 30 / 336
# 30 + 90 + 180 + 180 / 336

    CMA 3 & 4

    same as 1 & 2 only to be capped at 100%

    CMA 5

    # (numberof daysof theoreticaluse)/(f irsttolastevent)
# comment from code: # Otherwise, the sum of durations of the events excluding the last divided by the number of days between the first and the last event 
# arvesse võetakse gap days mis jäävad alles kui arvestada ravimite küllusega 
# gap days esimesest sündmusest viimase alguseni ja lahuta days supplyd (va viimane)
# Esimesel: 
# 1 - (60) / 210  
# Teisel
# 1 - (90) / 300

    CMA6 

    # # Esimesel: 
# 1 - (60 + 96) / 336  
# Teisel
# 1 - (90) / 336
# (numberof daysof theoreticaluse)/(firsteventtoendofobservationwindow)
plot(results$CMA6, show.legend = FALSE, align.all.patients = FALSE, align.first.event.at.zero = TRUE, period.in.days = 60)

    CMA7 

    # 1- (145+60+96) / 481
# 1 - (120 + 90) / 481
# (numberof daysof theoreticaluse)/(starttoendof observationwindow)
plot(results$CMA7, period.in.days = 60, show.legend = FALSE)

    CMA8 

    # (numberof daysof theoreticaluse)/(laggedstarttoendof observationwindow
# 1- (145+60+96) / 481
# 1 - (120 + 90) / (481-25) <- sisse tulev sündmus jääb välja
plot(results$CMA8,period.in.days = 60, show.legend = FALSE)
    ## Warning in plot.window(...): "period.in.days" is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in plot.window(...): "show.legend" is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in plot.xy(xy, type, ...): "period.in.days" is not a graphical
## parameter

    CMA9 

    # number of days in the observation window, each weighted by the ratio
# of days supply applicable to their event interval) 
#   /
#(start to end of observation window)

# !take account the overlap with obs window!
# ((1 - 612/702) * 306) / 481
# ((1 - 0/30)*30 + (1 - 60/180)*180 + (1 - 492/522) * 126) / 481
# ((1 - 120/180)*145 + (1 - 0/30)*30 + (1 - 90/180)*180 + (1 - 0/90) * 90 + (1 - 162/432) * 36) / 481 
plot(results$CMA9,period.in.days = 60, show.legend = FALSE)
    ## Warning in plot.window(...): "period.in.days" is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in plot.window(...): "show.legend" is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in plot.xy(xy, type, ...): "period.in.days" is not a graphical
## parameter
    ## Warning in plot.xy(xy, type, ...): "show.legend" is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in axis(side = side, at = at, labels = labels, ...): "period.in.days"
## is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in axis(side = side, at = at, labels = labels, ...): "show.legend" is
## not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in axis(side = side, at = at, labels = labels, ...): "period.in.days"
## is not a graphical parameter
    ## Warning in axis(side = side, at = at, labels = labels, ...): "show.legend" is

    sample_data <- data.frame(
  person_id = c(1,1,1,1,1,2,2,2,3),
  drug_concept_id = c(1,2,1,1,2,1,1,1,1),
  drug_exposure_start_date = c(
    as.Date("2010-12-02"),
    as.Date("2011-05-31"),
    as.Date("2011-06-30"),
    as.Date("2011-12-27"),
    as.Date("2012-03-26"),
    as.Date("2011-05-31"),# // other patient
    as.Date("2011-06-30"), 
    as.Date("2011-12-27"), #
    as.Date("2011-06-30") # // last pt
    #as.Date("2011-12-27")
  ),
  days_supply = c(60,30,90,180,180,60,90,30, 90),
  cohort_start_date = rep(c(as.Date("2011-01-06")),times=9),
  cohort_end_date = rep(c(as.Date("2012-05-01")),times=9),
  observation_period_start_date = rep(c(as.Date("2009-11-07")),times=9),
  observation_period_end_date = rep(c(as.Date("2013-06-01")),times=9)
)
    sample_data_gpt <- data.frame(
  person_id = c(3),
  drug_concept_id = c(1),
  drug_exposure_start_date = c(
    as.Date("2011-06-30") 
  ),
  days_supply = c(90),
  observation_window_start = rep(c(as.Date("2011-01-06")),times=1),
  observation_window_end = rep(c(as.Date("2012-05-01")),times=1),
  follow_up_period_start = rep(c(as.Date("2009-11-07")),times=1),
  follow_up_period_end = rep(c(as.Date("2013-06-01")),times=1)
)
